name: Purrfect Detective: Find Coots
description:
Coots is a beloved kitten who lives in a quiet neighborhood.  But one day, Coots snuck out of the house and went missing. Her owner hired you to find Coots!

Goal

There are 15 level where you have to find Coots in the crowd of other cats. Be quick! You have only 10 seconds per level.

Controls

Use "Left Mouse Button" to do all the things.
